title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls

**Product Description:**

Introducing the Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels from Amazon Brand, offering unbeatable convenience and value. This bulk pack includes 12 huge rolls, each with 158 sheets of 2-ply paper towels. That's equivalent to 38 regular rolls!

**Key Features:**

* Huge Roll size for fewer roll changes and more cleaning power
* Flex-a-Size design allows you to tear off the perfect-sized sheet for any mess
* Up to 75% more absorbent than leading 1-ply brands, making quick work of spills and messes
* White color and 2-ply construction for added strength and durability
* Compare to Bounty Paper Towels - our Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels offer similar quality at a fraction of the cost

**Packaging Details:**

* 12 huge rolls per pack
* 2 packs of 6 rolls each for easy storage and transport
* Each roll contains 158 sheets of 2-ply paper towels

**Why Choose Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels?**

* Save time and money with our bulk packaging and competitive pricing
* Enjoy the convenience of fewer roll changes and more cleaning power per roll
* Trust the Amazon Brand for quality and reliability in your paper towel products

**Order Now and Start Cleaning with Confidence!**
